# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The position of the first element in a nonempty array.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

For an instance of `ContiguousArray`, `startIndex` is always zero. If the array is empty, `startIndex` is equal to `endIndex`.
title: startIndex
